localize.text: Manager? What seems to be wrong?
Will you wait just a moment? If you can’t bear to look, you should close your eyes.
There, I fixed it. There was a system error, however, it shouldn’t be so easily compromised.
It's a technology originally developed during the war, now widely used for commercial purposes.
Honestly, it's not that impressive of a technology.
The human brain is fragile. Seeing such a cruel and shocking sight may unintentionally lead to a momentary 'shut down' of the brain's functions.
If a manager like you were to suffer such a reaction, it would be very difficult for me.
So I installed a perception filter in your display.
While the perception filter functions, dead employees will look like cute dolls splattered with red paint.
Abnormalities, well, those who could damage your mental state. They will be seen as adorable toys.
Trust me, before the perception filter was installed, lots of managers lost their sanity on that seat.
I can’t let you join them.
